data.title: Cecil Mae Turner Obituary 2022
data.meta_description: Cecil Mae Turner, 85, of Lovingston departed this life on Tuesday, May 3, 2022 at Kings Daughters Community Health and Rehab Center in Staunton.Born March 27, 1937 in Virginia s...
data.text:
Cecil Mae Turner, 85, of Lovingston departed this life on Tuesday, May 3, 2022 at Kings Daughters Community Health and Rehab Center in Staunton.

Born March 27, 1937 in Virginia she was the daughter of the late Sidney Moss and Lottie Turner.

She was preceded in death by her husband, Van Bill Turner.

She is survived by three sons, Roger Turner of Madison Heights, Larry Turner of Lovingston, and Michael Turner of Lovingston; one sister, Jean Ellen Turner of Arrington; two brothers, Butch Turner and Thomas Turner both of Maryland; two grandchildren, Tiffany Turner and Simone Turner and two great-grandchildren, Rashawn Garland and Trevon Watkins.

A graveside service will be held at 2:00 p.m. on Saturday, May 7, 2022 at the Turner Family Cemetery in Lovingston with Rev. Herbert Woodson, Jr. officiating.

Arrangements by Wells/Sheffield Funeral Chapel, Lovingston, Va (434-263-4097).
